body_html: The Java API actually interfaces with TF through the C API, so most of the functionality needed should be compiled in already -- It's just possible that it gets stripped out at link time if it's not accessed via a Java JNI function in order to save space.
body_text: The Java API actually interfaces with TF through the C API, so most of the functionality needed should be compiled in already -- It's just possible that it gets stripped out at link time if it's not accessed via a Java JNI function in order to save space.
body: The Java API actually interfaces with TF through the C API, so most of the functionality needed should be compiled in already -- It's just possible that it gets stripped out at link time if it's not accessed via a Java JNI function in order to save space.
